data.name: Fix santas List - Christmas special #1
data.description:
Fix santas List - Puzzles #6

HELP! Santa's famous naughty and nice list has been hacked. Santa feared there could be problem going digital! Santa's naughty and nice list has been encrypted by some ransomware and now it won't give it up! You must help santa decrypt his list.

Task

Your task is to decrypt santa's list, it seems to be using a kind of [Polyalphabetic Cipher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polyalphabetic_cipher) with a single rotating barrel, you must decrypt the string and return it as an json string object, it will be encoded as a json string.

Note

You have received some insider information, the information used in the encryption program is contained somewhere in the global context by the name ```KrAmPuS```
